failure.message: The following asserts failed: expected [Almeria (LEI) - Barcelona (BCN)] but found [Almería (LEI) - Barcelona (BCN)], expected [26/6/2017 - 20/7/2017] but found [26/06/2017 - 20/07/2017], expected [2 Adults, 2 Children, 2 Babies] but found [2 Adultos, 2 Niños, 2 Bebés]
